name: Slash Them All
description:
A prototype of an unfinished Hack&Slash game.

Choose your character between the Soldier, the Archer and the Mage and defeat your enemies in an arena.

Controls

Controls are wasd (or zqsd) to move and left click for first ability, right click for second ability and space for third ability.

Abilities

Soldier :

  1. Attacks in front of the player
  2. Jumps at the highlighted area (hold click to see the area)
  3. Increases move speed and spins to deal damage near the player

Archer :

  1. Fires an arrow dealing a lot of damage
  2. Places a trap immobilizing any enemy walking into
  3. Increases move speed and lower first ability cooldown

Mage :

  1. Fires a fireball dealing damage in an explosion
  2. Creates a wall of ice somewhere
  3. Swaps the targeted enemy location with the player's
